events.name: First Code Academy Summer Camps Info Session 2018
events.description:
Learn to think by learning to code.
Know more about First Code Academy's pedagogy and comprehensive roadmap designed for students as young as 4 years old.
Come join us for an Info Session! Learn more about the course content, hear from the instructors, and discover what it means for your child to learn at First Code Academy.Please feel free to let us know if you have any questions in the meantime. Contact us: hellosg@firstcodeacademy.com | 6820 2633 


Shaping Future Creators
First Code Academy is a leading education institute that teaches kids coding courses and develop curriculum for K-12 students to learn not just coding skills, but computational thinking. Our goal is to empower children and teenagers to become creative leaders in the digital era, for their future career and for driving social change.
events.location: First Code Academy, 04-13 Stamford Court, 61 Stamford Road, Singapore 178892

events.name: Blockchain as Service: The Game Changers
events.description: Hey Likers, There will be an event with two icos, Chynge and Bountie.Please register at their eventbrite page:https://www.eventbrite.sg/e/blockchain-as-service-the-game-changers-tickets-45750752733?aff=eand In this event, two local startups are sharing how blockchain will affect the industries. From payment gateways to gaming, Chynge and Bountie will use their journey as case studies. We aim for this event to be a fun, engaging, and entertaining success with a group of passionate people interested in blockchain and ICOs. About the SpeakersJoe Tusin, CEO & founder of Chynge Joe is a seasoned technology industry veteran. With over thirty years’ experience in technology and analytics in financial serves, management consulting, startups and large technology companies, Joe knows how to build and sell enterprise-class software. Joe leverages his experience with AI/Machine Learning in predicting human behavior to build predictive models that underly the digital payments on the Chynge blockchain. Joe is passionate about financial inclusion and wants to make digital payments instant, free and safe for everyone. Jose He, CPO & co-founder of Bountie Technologies With more than ten years of experience under his belt as a Senior Business Development Strategist & former executive chairman of Speaker & Trainer Association, José is a versatile leader who best excels in local startups bearing the entrepreneurial mindset. He also excels in public speaking and is well known for his dynamic and energetic style of presentation, which often leaves the audience feeling upbeat, curious and engaged. José’s vision involves moving into a position that allows him to maximise his well-honed skills as a speaker, leader, organiser and entrepreneur, challenging himself to pilot Bountie to become the number one household name among everyday gamers in Asia. Event Agenda:6.30pm - Registration7pm - Introduction7.05pm - Chynge Presentation by Joe Tusin7.20pm - Bountie Presentation by Jose He7.35pm - Q&A session8pm - Networking and RefreshmentsFree food, drinks and booze available!
events.location: PayPal Singapore, Suntec City, 5 Temasek Blvd, #07-01 Suntec Tower Five, 038985
events.group_name: All Who Like Cryptocurrency and Blockchain

events.name: Intro to Web Design (R4) - For SMEs/Property Agents/Aspiring Web Designers
events.description:
Introduction to Web Design (R4) - For SMEs/Property Agents/Aspiring Web Designers
This is a free introductory course to those who are exploring stepping into this industry, picking up web design skills, or creating their own websites.
Course Criteria
If you are...

an aspiring web designer/developer?
a business owner/property agent looking to create your own budget website?
looking to sell things online through your own website?
interested to join the web industry?
exploring web design courses to sign up for, but not sure if you're ready for it?

If you fall into any of the above categories, this introductory session is for you!

Course Outline

What is a website? What is web design?
What makes up a website? What are the basic elements in a web template?
What makes up a website? What goes on behind the scenes?
How will UI, UX & SEO affect web design?
What are the various ways of creating a website and the costs/resources involved?


Course Format
Each class has a maximum of 10 people, and group discussions are frequently held throughout the session. This course is an introductory session, so no laptops are required, although recommended.

Course Fee
This is a free introductory session. At no point before, during or after this course will we collect a fee for your participation in this course. Light snacks and drinks will be provided. All participants will also be granted a one-time 10% discount for all of Oangle's services or courses available (valid for 3 months).

Other notes:
This course will start and end on time. Please notify Oangle if you are unable to make it. This class will only go ahead if there are at least 4 participants. You will be notified in case of cancellation by 4PM on the day of the course.
